subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bobby Thomson is no longer the Flying Scot of his Giants days, but he remains gentle and self-effacing 55 years after his famous home run to win the 1951 N.L. pennant.
snippet: Bobby Thomson is no longer the Flying Scot of his Giants days, but he remains gentle and self-effacing 55 years after his famous home run to win the 1951 N.L. pennant.
